opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Iowa Conference of the United Methodist Church v. Kliebenstein Et Vir

opinion:
540 U.S. 977

IOWA CONFERENCE OF THE UNITED METHODIST CHURCH ET AL.
v.
KLIEBENSTEIN ET VIR.

No. 03-390.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 20, 2003.

1

Appeal from the Sup. Ct. Iowa.

2

Motions of Professor Carl H. Esbeck et al., GuideOne Insurance Co., and Southern Baptist Convention for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 663 N. W. 2d 404.
